articles.title: About this site
articles.contents: Kia ora, my name is Nancy Huang, and I am currently in my third year at the University of Auckland, doing a Bachelor of Science majoring in Earth Science. This portfolio is to display some of the work I have done throughout my time in university, and to showcase some of the skills I have gained through the work I have done. It is also to indicate the type of work I can produce based on different contexts and different courses that I have taken through university. Thanks for taking the time to have a look!

articles.title: Nancy's University Portfolio
articles.description: Welcome to the website. I hope you enjoy it!
